short_summary: Part#SL33774SH2, Mfr 1BZ19, Inner Wire Assy(230) LFH(VE)-Antenna Wire, qty 40
description: The solicitation details the procurement of various electrical components, including wire assemblies and antennas. The requirements are for 40 units of Inner Wire Assy(230) LFH(VE)-Antenna Wire, 40 units of Outer Wire Assy(230) LFH(VE)-Antenna Wire, 20 units of Ground Peg Assy SVK/LFH, 60 units of Coupling Piece Assy LONGSHOT,SVK/LFH, 20 units of Pouch SVK/LFH, and  40 units of Reel Assy.
full_summary:
### Electoral Products Tender Notice

#### Reference:
* **Solicitation Number**: MMF-163-MP01
* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-6355-16041013

#### Tender Details:

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), on behalf of the Departmental Purchasing Activity (DPA) of the Department of National Defence, is soliciting proposals to purchase electrical equipment as outlined in the attached description. The procurement is governed by the Trade Agreement.

#### Tender Schedule:

* **Tender Closing Date**: June 30th, 2023, at 11:59 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: July 1, 2023

#### Tender Overview:

[Briefly mention the various types of electrical equipment to be purchased]

* Fifteen (15) different types of electrical equipment, including antenna wires, pouches, and ground peg assemblies, were identified and specified for procurement following the bid.

#### Procurement Information:

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence

#### Tender Contact:
To receive further information, respond to a tender or ask for clarification instruments, please refer to the attached documents or contact the following governmental office:

* **Name**: Michael Purves
* **E-mail**: [michael.purves@forces.gc.ca](mailto:michael.purves@forces.gc.ca)
* **Telephone**: (613) 541-5010
* **Address**: Department of National Defence, 14 Redpatch Avenue, Kingston, ON K7K 7B4, Canada

#### Bidder Instructions:
Please refer to the attached documents for further details. Bids will be accepted electronically through [insert link]. Don't hesitate to reach out with any questions. Note that this tender is no longer active.

I hope this rewritten entry meets your expectations. Let me know if there are any further changes you'd like me to make! [writes a few notes in the margin]

### Addendum
In preparation of this novel translation, I took note of the following: 

1) Taking liberty to make assumption about bid has expired based on empty **tenderStatus**.  
2) Ignoring
